html:
4.4.19  5:37 pm   why do you write music

     you can glitch the universe that way

4.4.19  5:10 pm   were you possibly tested gifted as a child?

     i never took a test for that, but someone asked me to 'touch my elbow' and i demonstrated it wasn't possible because i assumed that it was supposed to be the hand and elbow on the same side

4.4.19  4:47 pm   will you release a song or album on vinyl?

     i don't know how and don't want to, but i may do it anyway

4.4.19  4:43 pm   did you carry a sweater do the south pole?

     i have never been to the south pole, but if i did it would be better to wear the sweater instead of carry it

4.4.19  3:35 pm   Can you include the triangle in your next video

     sure

4.4.19  3:27 pm   how can i raise the generally-accepted "sea level"?

     just add water

4.4.19  2:47 pm   What is your relationsship to technology?

     friendly

     If you could choose to only have a non smart cellphone or even no cellphone at all, would you?

     i can always choose that by simply getting rid of my smart phone

      Do you think it would improve your life and productivity?

     yes and no

4.4.19  2:23 pm   i'm 98 years old

     i don't believe you

     is it too late for me to pick up singing?

4.4.19  1:22 pm   you look nearly the same every time you appear in a video. are you invincible to the physical effects of passing time?

     no

      if so, how can i get like that,

4.4.19  12:59 pm   Do you believe that birds exist?

     yes

4.4.19  12:39 pm   do you like chairs?

     yes

4.4.19  12:20 pm   Hi, im steve

     believable

4.4.19  12:13 pm   do you have a vibraslap?

     yes

      those might be cool to use in a song someday

4.4.19  11:05 am   are you excited for the heat death of the universe?

     skeptical

4.4.19  10:30 am   what would you do if someone made a robot identical to you in every way?

     change

4.4.19  10:27 am   How fast can you tie a tie?

     at a medium pace

4.4.19  9:51 am   i gotta know, how did you record your voice for reality vids while you were driving a car? 

     using a voice recorder

4.4.19  9:45 am   why is it that all my most successful feats are the ones that i put the least amount of effort in? 

     that is the principle of friendliness

4.4.19  9:33 am   if you could design your own computer operating system what would you put in there

     myself

4.4.19  9:00 am   Are you cool with yourself?

     yes and no

4.4.19  8:35 am   do you like radiohead?

     way too sad but sure

4.4.19  8:35 am   do you want to go to the mall yet

     yes

4.4.19  8:29 am   You seem to be generally against the idea of spoiling songs before they're released. I know you've given out song titles in advance a few times but generally you seem adverse to it. Why is that?

     they are better unspoiled. many things are better unspoiled

4.4.19  8:19 am   What's the exact location of the land of the two letter words

     up

4.4.19  7:35 am   What's a deep philosophical quotation that inspires you?

     what

4.4.19  7:00 am   which of your longer songs (just did a bad thing, hello sexy pants, might quit, etc) did you enjoy composing the most?

     i am not done. verdict not in yet

4.4.19  4:03 am   Do you feel compelled to post more "reality videos"?

     every friday

      The most recent ones are still from 2016, around the time "Hallelujah" and "And The Day Goes On" were finished.

     that's when the source content is, but they were assembled/edited and turned into videos in 2019

4.4.19  2:56 am   As a musician, you inspire me more than words can explain. Do you handle every aspect of your music production? (including mixing, mastering, ETC)

     yes

4.4.19  1:04 am   what do you value in a person

     personality

4.4.19  12:33 am   Why is the newest anagram "Easter bunny" in white?

     that's what is known in the industry as a "mistake"

4.4.19  12:28 am   Is it true?

     partially

4.4.19  12:23 am   why don't you vine anymore?

     impossible

4.4.19  12:08 am   what does sumic mean in your spotify bio?

     music

4.3.19  11:43 pm   is the anagram you make out of an anagram request in any way influenced by your desired reply to the said anagram request?

     yes if possible

4.3.19  10:48 pm   I used to get piano lessons but about 3 years ago I stopped. Should I get lessons again or just re-teach myself? I feel like that would be cheaper

     piano lessons make people quit. i've never heard of anyone ever having piano lessons without it causing them to quit

4.3.19  10:45 pm   should I learn how to play the drums? 

     i don't know

4.3.19  9:32 pm   i am a compulsive procrastinator. how do i get my work done on time?

     it sounds like you probably don't

4.3.19  9:16 pm   am I a lemon?

     to a certain degree of likelihood

4.3.19  8:33 pm   how do I solve traffic jams

     remove some of the cars and place them in other traffic jams

4.3.19  8:12 pm   Are you my therapist

     everyone is therapist

4.3.19  8:11 pm   What is youtube?

     some type of very large personal straw

4.3.19  7:51 pm   can you play any brass or woodwind instruments?

     no

4.3.19  7:12 pm   I have like 20 rubber trucks, want one

     do you have any smaller sized rubber vehicles

4.3.19  6:51 pm   what do you think is at the end of the universe?

     you

      do you think it's part of something bigger or is there nothing around it, is it just floating in the middle of nothing?

     the spacial dimension might go on infinitely

      if so, how does something float in the middle of nothing?

     i don't know

4.3.19  6:22 pm   do you have any content/songs etc that you scrapped

     some of the best songs are made from scraps

      and if so you can name all of them if you want.

     i can't name the ones that have not been released yet

4.3.19  5:33 pm   how's the video/content going? 

     i'm not sure

4.3.19  5:32 pm   bill help i think i am going to die and i literally sit around and do nothing all day what do i do

     nothing

4.3.19  5:02 pm   how to combat post-missed-deadline slump?

     i don't know, but here's an idea

4.3.19  3:11 pm   There are morning people and night people and non-24 hour people. Why do only the morning people get to rule the world? 

     morning only people do not rule the world. it is only people who can master the entire day

     yes
